SEARCH
Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.command

Class SubCommand

java.lang.Object
com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.command.SubCommand
public abstract class SubCommand extends Object
An abstract SubCommand class that hooks into commands registered by Duels.
See Also:
  • Duels.registerSubCommand(String, SubCommand)

  • Constructor Details

    • SubCommand

      public SubCommand(@NotNull String name, @Nullable String usage, @Nullable String description, @Nullable String permission, boolean playerOnly, int length, String... aliases)
      The constructor for a subcommand.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of this subcommand. Should not be null!
      usage - Usage of this subcommand. May be null.
      description - Description of this subcommand. May be null.
      permission - Permission of this subcommand. May be null.
      playerOnly - Whether or not this subcommand should be player only.
      length - Length of this subcommand. Must be greater than or equal to 1.
      aliases - Aliases of this subcommand.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      The name of this subcommand.
      Returns:
      Never-null String that is the name of this subcommand.

    • getUsage

      public String getUsage()
      The usage of this subcommand.
      Returns:
      Usage of this subcommand or null if unspecified.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      The description of this subcommand.
      Returns:
      Description of this subcommand or null if unspecified.

    • getPermission

      public String getPermission()
      The permission of this subcommand. If set to null, it will inherit its parent's permission.
      Returns:
      Permission of this subcommand or null if unspecified.

    • isPlayerOnly

      public boolean isPlayerOnly()
      Whether or not this subcommand can only be used by a player. If the parent of this subcommand is player only, this value will not be considered.
      Returns:
      True if this subcommand is player only. False otherwise.

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      The length of this subcommand.
      Returns:
      Length of this subcommand.

    • getAliases

      public String[] getAliases()
      The aliases of this subcommand.
      Returns:
      Aliases of this subcommand.

    • execute

      public abstract void execute(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String label, String[] args)
